attributes.additional_details: It is ruining our holidays, for example: holidays/breaks are supposed to be fun and joy for children and teenagers, homework prevents us from having an adequate childhood. I am more than happy for this to be published
attributes.background: The fact that homework is taking up precious childhood, i’m also jealous of the fact Ireland has banned homework, it would also save schools a fair amount of money. To a lot  of people homework is also a mental strain and makes it incredibly stressful and difficult.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622990
